page.title: 18TRANSPORT
page.content: {A Hotspur Midland Red bus}service travels on the A458 road to and from Bridgnorth, 6 times each way daily. The fare to Shrewsbury is 53p for adults and 36p for children under 16 years old. The now dismantled{Great {Western Railway}line has in over half its length become part of neighbouring fields. Elsewhere it is overgrown. The Parish{Voluntary Car Scheme}has recently finished because of lack of volunteer drivers.{A bus}to Much Wenlock Secondary School is provided free of charge to the children aged 11-16 by the Education Authority since they all live at least 3 miles away from the school. Nearly all the households have at least one{car. The older teenagers often have{motor {bikes}whilst all the younger children have{pedal cycles.
